name: Bodyconscious Digital Rave! Part 1: Shinjuku & Takashi
overview: Another one of those Japanese-only 'games' that truly defined the 3DO as the ultimate multimedia masterpiece of the early 90s. (In other words, it's just a video formatted to only play on the 3DO system)  A oddity,  Body Conscious Part 1- Shinjuku & Takashi Digital Rave ! simulates the nightlife of Japan by taking you to the club scene where you can engage in simulated partying.
